question.para: My analysis didn't generate result files. What happened?

answer.para: If you have waited the appropriate amount of time and there are no output files, then one of the analysis modules has crashed. See Troubleshooting Tree Failures for information on determining why the tree crashed.

question.para: Why can't I view the results of the treedraw analysis?

answer.para: If you are trying to view the results of the treedraw analysis using Acrobat Reader and Reader crashes, you may have run treedraw with too many input rows. You may either view the output pdf using a different pdf viewer, like xpdf, or you should restrict the number of rows that treedraw takes as input.

question.para: My array order isn't associated with a special center, but it should be. Why? How can I correct it?

answer.para: Array orders should be associated with special centers when you initially request the order. If you do not see the option for the special center that you are a part of, you need to contact the special center administrator or the administrator so that you can be designated as a member of the special center in &product;.
If the order has already been created and is not associated with the special center, you will have to contact the administrator for assistance in correcting the problem.
